AboutPage.title: Info
AboutPage.description: Learn more about our mission and team.

who.title: Who Are We?
description: Hey! I’m Eligio Rosa, a web designer and full-stack developer based in Western Washington with over 10 years of experience building websites and digital tools that just work. I’ve worked with clients across Puerto Rico and the mainland U.S., from small schools to big companies, and now I’m focused on helping local businesses in the PNW stand out online.

I handle everything from clean, mobile-friendly designs to backend development with PHP, Node.js, and React. I’ve created hundreds of websites, deployed apps on AWS, managed databases, and built tools that solve real problems. Need a website in English and Spanish? No problem—I build fully bilingual pages that connect with all your customers.

Whether you're a small business needing a website or a creative needing a portfolio, I bring tech skills and a creative eye to the table. Not into tech talk? No worries. I keep it human, clear, and honest. Let’s make your idea real—and make it look good while we’re at it.

what.title: What Do We Do?
what.description: We’re here to make the web work for you. Whether you're building something new or need a fresh start, we’ve got your back with services that are practical, clean, and built to fit your goals:
services: Custom websites that look great on phones and desktops
Branding, logos, and visuals that feel like you
Help with updates, hosting, and maintenance
Easy-to-manage custom CMS so you’re in control
what.footer: We don’t overcomplicate things—just solid, smart solutions to help you show up online.
